Text: Before I download this, can someone tell me if the songs fade into one another?  I've downloaded 3 Deadmau5 things already, and none of them fade..   They're supposed to fade into one another! >-
@x0myheart0x Yes, the tracks all flow together seamlessly on this album.
If there's a fade or gap between songs, it could be that you need to set iTunes to "Gapless" for this album.  Works for me...
Thanks for this - Great quality and range!  As it should be heard...
